scripts.android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res ; react-native run-android
scripts.android-dev: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file indexDev.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res ; react-native run-android --variant betaDebug
